mapper.select: select product.*, (sysdate + deliveryPeriod) arrivalDate from product order by categoryCode asc, productCode desc
select product.*, (sysdate + deliveryPeriod) arrivalDate from product where productCode = #{productCode}
mapper.insert: insert into product values ( seq_product.nextval, #{productName}, #{productDetailName}, #{productPrice}, #{productDescription}, #{vendorName}, #{attachInfo}, sysdate, #{useable}, #{categoryCode}, #{deliveryPeriod}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{deliveryArea} )
